I had forgotten to increment the version number when adding types for variables to the index. This could cause the corruption you are seeing. I have incremented the version number which will cause a reindex. In the meantime, you can do a manual reindex to make sure the exception goes away.
Changing to target milestone to 4.0. This bug was fixed after 3.1.0. It may have been fixed in the 3.1 stream, but then it would be fixed in 4.0 too, hopefully...
